Token.Abstract: Particle System base class Attributes of a Particle System: - emmision rate of the particles - Gravity Mode (Mode A): - gravity - direction - speed +- variance - tangential acceleration +- variance - radial acceleration +- variance - Radius Mode (Mode B): - startRadius +- variance - endRadius +- variance - rotate +- variance - Properties common to all modes: - life +- life variance - start spin +- variance - end spin +- variance - start size +- variance - end size +- variance - start color +- variance - end color +- variance - life +- variance - blending function - texture
